Detailed Description

Interface module for protein descriptors.

Header file with the definitions pertaining to module P_descr.c. It is usually included via P_extern.h

Precondition:
Requires PORTABLE.H for definition of type status.
See also:
portable.h
Author:
J. R. Valverde
Date:
8-apr-1990

Function Documentation

status feature_name (  char *    file ) 
 

Returns the name of the last feature read.

Parameters:
file  String to store the name.
Returns:
SUCCESS if so, FAIL if there is not current feature name.
Warning:
This function is HIGHLY SYSTEM DEPENDENT. Supposes that f_name is long enough to hold the name.

status get_feature (  feature_t *    f ) 
 

Prompt user for feature file and read it.

Asks the user for the feature to be used in the search and reads it from the file.

Parameters:
f  Table to read data values into.
Returns:
SUCCESS if read's been OK. FAIL otherwise.

status read_descriptor (  char *    file,
descriptor_t *    d
) 
 

Read descriptor.

Parameters:
file  Name of file containing the descriptor definition.
d  Structure to store the descriptor in.
Returns:
TRUE if all went well, FALSE otherwise.

int read_feature (  char *    file,
feature_t *    f
) 
 

Reads data values from the especified feature values file.

Parameters:
file  Name of file containing values.
f  Feature table filled with the values.
Note:
Values must be stored in the following format: "AminoAcid (1 letter code) HTAB Value CR/LF"
Returns:
Number of amino acid values read.
